scripts.version:pre: echo '发布预发布beta版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version prerelease --preid beta
scripts.version:preminor: echo '发布小版本beta版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version preminor --preid beta
scripts.version:premajor: echo '发布主版本beta版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version premajor --preid beta
scripts.version:patch: echo '发布补丁版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version patch
scripts.version:minor: echo '发布小版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version minor
scripts.version:major: echo '发布主版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version major
scripts.version:graduate: echo '预发布版本包升级为稳定版本' && cross-env HUSKY=1 lerna version --conventional-graduate
scripts.publish-all: lerna run build && lerna publish from-package
scripts.publish-all-pre: lerna run build && lerna publish from-package --pre-dist-tag beta
